content: the simply wool blouse is a loose-knit blouse featuring a simple boat neck crafted with thin yarn and medium-sized needles this design yields a light airy texture the blouse is easy to knit and a good fit for a first time knitter the blouse is worked from the top down in stockinette stitch incorporating raglan increases and finished with i-cord edges the body and sleeves are worked in the round and finished with an i-cord edge finally stitches are picked up around the neckline and bound off to create an i-cord edge here as well sizes xs s m l xl gauge 24 stitches / 38 rounds = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches in stockinette stitch on needle 4 mm us6 needle size circular needle 4 mm us6 40 and 80 cm 16 and 32 in circular needle 3 mm us2 5 40 and 80 cm 16 and 32 in double-pointed needles 4 mm us6 and 3 mm us2 5 materials 200 200 250 250 250 g filcolana saga 300 m = 50 g if you choose another yarn the amount may vary always check the yardage when choosing yarn so that you have enough for your project you can use any yarn you like as long as the gauge matches i recommend always knitting a swatch that you wash before measuring the gauge you may need to go up or down in needle size to get the correct gauge measurements bust width 94 100 106 112 118 cm 37 39 5 41 75 44 46 5 in fits bust measurements of approximately 80-85 85-90 90-95 95-100 100-110 cm 31 5-33 5 33 5-35 5 35 5-37 5 37 5-39 5 39 5-43 25 in measure yourself at the widest part of your torso full length 46 47 49 50 51 cm 18 25 18 5 19 25 19 75 20 inches measured from the middle of the back ease the blouse is approximately 10-15 cm 4-6 in positive ease xs s m l xl is intended to fit bust measurements of 80-85 85-90 90-95 95-100 100-110 cm 31 5-33 5 33 5-35 5 35 5-37 5 37 5-39 5 39 5-43 25 in yarn pictured filcolana saga 116 forget me not
